body:
Comment 2: 
That range pkgIndex.m[pkgName] is expected to be a pretty small set: e.g. for pgkName
"template", we'd start a goroutine for "text/template" and "html/template" and maybe
"github.com/foo/bar/template".

What is your input code (what import x is being added for "x.S" in your code) and GOPATH
directories that triggers this?

What is the output of

$ find $GOPATH/src -type d
